title: why is my sim card lost connection when outside temperature is low e.x 8-10celsius.
content: Hello. i have this problem on my pixel xl. When the outside temperature is low, for example 8-10 Celsius, in 2-3 minutes the phone cools down and the SIM card loses reception and writes "No sim-Card emergency calls only".When I warm up the phone, the sim-card starts working. On another phone this SIM card usually works in all environments. what can i do and what is solution?ðŸ™„
